temp.title: Incredible Cold
temp.description: Fatigue after 2 hours of travel, 4d6-6d6 cold damage every minute. Most snowy ground is difficult terrain or even greater difficult terrain

temp.title: Extreme Cold
temp.description: Fatigue after 4 hours of travel, 1d6-2d6 cold damage every 10 minutes. Most snowy ground is difficult terrain or even greater difficult terrain

temp.title: Severe Cold
temp.description: Fatigue after 4 hours of travel, 1d6-2d6 cold damage every hour. Most snowy ground is difficult terrain or even greater difficult terrain

temp.title: Mild Cold
temp.description: Fatigue after 4 hours of travel. Most snowy ground is difficult terrain or even greater difficult terrain

temp.title: Cool
temp.description: The weather is getting colter but does not require special precautions

temp.title: Severe heat
temp.description: Fatigue after 4 hours of travel, 1d6-2d6 fire damage every hour

temp.title: Extreme heat
temp.description: Fatigue after 4 hours of travel, 1d6-2d6 fire damage every 10 minutes

temp.title: Incredible heat
temp.description: Fatigue after 2 hours of travel, 4d6-6d6 fire damage every minute

wind.title: No wind
wind.description: At sea, this creates the _Dead Calm_ event.

wind.title: Calm Wind
wind.description: The wind is noticeable, but not disruptive.

wind.title: Light Wind
wind.description:
Circumstance penalty on auditory Perception.
Might induce circumstance penalty on physical ranged attacks.

wind.title: Strong Wind
wind.description:
Circumstance penalty on auditory Perception and physical ranged attacks.
Flying requires a Maneuver in Flight action, and fliers are blown away on a critical failure or if they don't succeed at a minimum of one such check each round.

snow.title: Clear
snow.description: The sky is clear of clouds and heroes can see quite far into the distance.

snow.title: Cloudy
snow.description: The Sun or Moon is obscured by clouds covering the sky.

snow.title: Light Snow
snow.description: Visual and Auditory perception takes a circumstance penalty. Creatures are concealed if far away.

snow.title: Heavy Snow
snow.description: Visual and Auditory perception takes a circumstance penalty. Creatures are concealed if far away. Soaked creatures treat Temperature at one level lower.

rain.title: Clear
rain.description: The sky is clear of clouds and heroes can see quite far into the distance.

rain.title: Cloudy
rain.description: The Sun or Moon is obscured by clouds covering the sky.

rain.title: Light Rain
rain.description: Visual and Auditory perception takes a circumstance penalty.

rain.title: Heavy Rain
rain.description: Visual and Auditory perception takes a circumstance penalty. Creatures are concealed if far away. Soaked creatures treat Temperature at one level lower. Trails are washed away and boats might cover their decks to prevent flooding.
